thread.section_title: About.com Top 40 & Pop Music: Most Popular Articles
thread.title: 10 Great Friendship Songs

title: 10 Great Friendship Songs
text:
Songs about friendship, a special type of love, are a little more rare than traditional love songs . However, there are still many to choose from. Enjoy this list of 10 of the best friendship songs. Beatles - Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band. Courtesy Capitol 1. "With a Little Help From My Friends" - Beatles - 1967 
Yes, indeed, friends can help get you through times of romantic trouble. Just ask Ringo. "With a Little Help From My Friends ," in its definitive version by the Beatles, was never released as a single. However, Joe Cocker took a version of the song into the pop charts in 1968.
